root.name: Battle Arena Toshinden Remix
root.description: In 1995, the popular Playstation launch title Battle Arena Toshinden was ported to the Sega Saturn with new content. Most notible of this content of the Story Mode, in which the characters fight each other with small bouts of dialogue in between. Also notible was the addition of the new character Cupido. Although Takara's original game is mostly the same, it's been slightly reprogrammed and published by Sega, making for mildly different gameplay.
